Back! Also, Machine Learning and Deep Learning Notes

06 December 2016

The last months have been incredibly busy and I haven’t been able to muster the energy to keep on working on this page. A bit ahead of time, but my New Years’ resolution is to be more active here from now on.

But let’s move on to the meatier announcement… I finally collected, scanned and organized a whole lot of notes I took in 2015 when I was studying Machine Learning and Deep Learning, here they are!
